div.bibl: La Parola dei Socialisti, Mar. 5, 1908. THE MARCH OF SOCIALISM

body.p: Lady Helen Zimmerman, Duchess of Manchester, one of the wealthiest society women of Chicago and a person of extraordinary culture and intelligence, has enrolled in the Socialist party as a member without office (gregaria). It is her intention to devote herself entirely to propaganda for the redemption of the masses which is the object for which our party was founded.
